title: IELTS Speaking Full Mock Exam 005
part1: What is your daily routine like on weekdays?
Do you consider yourself a morning person or a night owl?
How do you usually plan your day?
What do you do to stay productive when you feel tired?
Do you enjoy having a busy schedule?
How do you balance work and relaxation?

cueCard: Describe a time when you had to organise a complicated task.
• how you went about organising it
and explain what you learned from the experience.

part3: What skills are necessary to manage multiple tasks effectively?
Do you think people today are busier than in the past?
How can employers help staff manage their workload?
Do you believe work-life balance will improve in the future?
